userTypes.description: Final decision-maker for train induction. Access to all modules, override capabilities, and simulation tools.
Inputs and updates fitness certificates, job-card status, and inspection schedules from Maximo and IBL.
Manages wrap exposure targets, SLA constraints, and monitors branding compliance risks.
Handles stabling geometry, bay occupancy, shunting plans, and cleaning slot availability.
Maintains data pipelines, configures ingestion sources (Maximo, IoT, UNS), and ensures system health.
Analyzes historical data, runs ML forecasts, and proposes optimization strategies.
Views high-level dashboards for KPIs, SLA adherence, and fleet readiness summaries.
Updates cleaning status, job-card closures, and bay occupancy via mobile interface (limited access).
Read-only access to logs, overrides, and decision trails for regulatory and compliance review.
